modName: Drinks and Wines HD - Unique Bottles for Every Beverage
summary:
Textures in HD for Wine and more Beverages
--------------------------------------------------------------
Textures in HD per Vino e Bevande varie :)
descriptionHtml:
[center][youtube]QmjZDESZ-fw[/youtube][/center]

[center][img]http://img823.imageshack.us/img823/8688/fk5.gif[/img][/center]
[center][color=Gray][size=4]Description:[/size][/color]

this mod retextured bottles of wine, brandy, rum, beer, mead and skooma..
every beverage will have a different and personalized bottle!
and the empty barrels of wine will be semi-transparent (as in reality) [/center]

[center][color=gray][size=4]installation:[/size][/color]

to install just unpack the rar package,
extract the contents and overwrite the \"Data\" folder
with the one stored in the directory of skyrim ;)
then activate the file "Drink&WineHD.esp" from data files (skyrimlauncher) [/center]
[center][b][color=#4169E1][Requires Skyrim patched to version 1.8.151.0.7 or 1.9.32.0.8][/color][/b][/center]

[center][color=gray][size=4]translations available in optional files:[/size][/color][/center]
[center][img]http://www.gifanimate.com/data/media/787/bandiera-italia-immagine-animata-0003.gif[/img]   [img]http://www.gifanimate.com/data/media/789/bandiera-giappone-immagine-animata-0004.gif[/img]   [img]http://www.gifanimate.com/data/media/749/bandiera-cina-immagine-animata-0002.gif[/img][/center]
